Author: deena812044
Text: I had normal labs for the last year of my ED when my body was totalling going downhill resulting in total fatigue, dehabiliting aches, sore teeth, hair loss, etc. I was just paranoid enough about vitamins and electrolytes to have decent labs i guess. Only at the end did I have 2 things slightly off, potassium and lipase enzyme, but my body was super f***ed up by then regardless.  Any decent ED trained doctor does not think that "normal" labs means you're all better. My stuff is all normal now, but I still have to eat Minnie Maud cal #s and stay restful, or my body goes into freak out flu symptoms mode. And my team still sees me outpatient every week.  Good luck and keep on keeping on with recovery! <3<3<3

Author: DelicateBones
Text: I’m pretty sure if your labs are normal, they’ll see it as a positive that your body can handle recovery. Not invalidate you for treatment. That’s just your ED taunting you. :]
